name: Customize Bot Name & Avatar
info:
- Drag and drop the node in the palette and link it to the inject node
  - Customize the name and the avatar using the mxc link (learn how to get the mxc file link here: http://bit.ly/get-mxc-link)
  - Deploy
 - Click on the inject node
 - You're done


![enter image description here](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.freshdesk.com/data/helpdesk/attachments/production/43081642120/original/3tP-QasxD7e45Ksr1-aQAK5lenHd-frAjw.gif?1572521514)

name: Tekos only | get Customer
info: get Customer

name: Stripe | Update Billing Details
info:
## Stripe customer's billing details
This node is essential for updating the billing details of a specific customers, this node take in params the roomId, and the customer email either by manualy setting it in the **environement variables** fields, or passing it directly in the payload data as in `msg.payload.email` for the customer email, and  `msg.payload.roomId` for the room id. after fetching the customer this node return a form with the billing details fields.

name: Tekos only | Create Bot (in progress)
info: ce noeud a besoin d'une mise a jours, le formulaire + url api ne fonctionne plus

name: Tekos only | Send Subscription data To email
Stripe | get customer by email
info:
## Get stripe customer by email

This node take in params the email of customers, then fetch its data in stripe and return an object if found, in order to setup this node you must either set the email of the customer manualy in the node itself or passed it as a `msg.payload.email` from another node.

 * input : customer's email.
 * output 1 : the customer's data.
 * output 2 : error in config or no customer found.

name: Stripe | Apply Tax rate %
info:
## Apply Tax Rate Node
This node is very usefull when dealing with a stripe subscription. adding tax can be somtimes mandatory in some european countries. This node take in parameters the data object of a subscription, we recomand using the **Get subscription by id** node, and the default tax rate in the params of this node.
 * input : subscription data.
 * output 1 : subscription data with tax rate.
 * output 2 : technical error or no tax rate found.

name: Stripe | get Customer by ID
info:
## Get stripe customer by id

This node take in params the id of customers, then fetch its data in stripe and return an object if found,this node is particularly usefull if you know in adance the id of the customer and its much faster then the **Stripe | get Customer by email** node.

In order to setup this node you must either set the id of the customer manualy in the node itself or passed it as a `msg.payload.id` or `msg.subscription.customer` from another node.

 * input : customer's id.
 * output 1 : the customer's data.
 * output 2 : error in config or no customer found.

name: Update Card (depricated)
info:
Let your users Update Their Payment Cards in your Stripe Account


To connect your stripe account and get your Stripe credentials, use this link
http://bit.ly/tekos-connect-with-stripe



---


TEKOS_BOT_ID  (example: "@my-bot:m.tekos.co")

BOT_NAME (example: "my-bot")

FLOW_URL (example: "https://myflow.tekos.co")

BASE_URL (example:"https://m.tekos.co")

STRIPE_PUB_KEY (example: "pk_test_iM2cHoIPlKni69kx900zApvMqxD")

STRIPE_SEC_KEY (example: "sk_test_lfQauPCYWIRhS0DgNMNUN00NLLFrxrH")

API_URL  (example: /subscribe)

name: PipeDrive | Receive Notifications
info:
# 1-Set The webhook
 - Go to Pipedrive Settings, Webhook
 - Choose the  Events that you need to receive
 - Add the webhook url yourtekosflow/pipedrive
 - Add your login and credentials to securise http calls


# 2-Create the Bot
 - Create a Bot (for free) using tekos-bot by follwoing this link: [http://bit.ly/create-bot](http://bit.ly/create-bot)
 - Optional: Customize your bot [See how](http://bit.ly/customize-bot)


# 3-Connect your bot
3-Go to your tekos flow instance
Grab teh PipeDrive | Receive Event Node, link it to your
Add bot credentials in Tekos-In
Choose the room where you need to receive your notifications




Updated
Last values (barré) new value

![](https://i.imgur.com/Sd0Iyt8.png)

name: Stripe | get Subscription by Id
info:
## Get stripe subscription by id

This node take in params the id of subscription, then fetch its data in stripe and return an object if found.

In order to setup this node you must either set the id of the subscription manualy in the node itself or passed it as a `msg.payload.subscription` from another node.

 * input : subscription's id.
 * output 1 : the subscription's data.
 * output 2 : error in config or no subscription found.

name: Stripe | get plans by product
info:
## Get All Plans by product
This node is used to get all plans under one specific product, you must have one or more plans under your product in order to show the plans cards. this nodes take in parameter the **plan id** only via the param field.

 * input : product id.
 * output 1 : json data of cards
 * output 2 : error

info:

name: Save User Attribute
info:
The attributes service is essentially a simple key/value store.

It allows you to keep track of any attribute (for example, a name, age, or preference).

Place this node before the bot question if you need to store the user reponse as the attribute value (like shown in the image).

Otherwise, you can set the attribute and it's value whenever you need.




![Attrbites & steps](https://i.imgur.com/Vkq5abQ.png)

name: Set a STEP
info:
With STEPs you can prevent the user reponse to be passed throw the switch command or the NLP process.

In a user flow, is the attribute STEP exists, it can have only one value and it is ephemerical.
When a pending Step Pass throw the 'Interaction classifier' Node, it disappean, unliess to call it again before a user response.

Think of them as virtual checkpoints for where the user is within the conversational structure.



here is an example of setting a
![Attributes & steps](https://i.imgur.com/Joigul5.png)


![Attributes & steps](https://i.imgur.com/ixnD63S.png)



![Attributes & steps](https://i.imgur.com/x1aj61B.png)

name: Get user
info:
This node take in params the senderId and the roomID, and send back as response the global data
- if the senderId or the roomId are missing , the output 1 return an empty payload with an error result.
- if the senderId exist but no global data is found, the node create a new global data and assign it to the sender user.
- if the senderId exist and the global data exist, the node return a success response with the data as a pyload.

name: Whois
info:
https://matrix.org/docs/spec/client_server/latest#get-matrix-client-r0-admin-whois-userid

Gets information about a particular user.

This API may be restricted to only be called by the user being looked up, or by a server admin. Server-local administrator privileges are not specified in this document.

name: get customer account
get room id

func:
node.warn("finishing creating form"); node.warn(msg) msg.payload = msg.payload; msg.url = "https://"+env.get("BASE_URL")+"/_matrix/client/r0/rooms/"+msg.roomId+"/send/m.room.message?access_token="+env.get("TEKOS_BOT_TOKEN"); var customer = msg.customer; var line1, line2, country, postalcode, state, city, taxid, phone, company, name,gole,role; if(customer.metadata){ phone = customer.phone; company = customer.metadata.company; name = customer.name; }else{ phone = ""; company = ""; name = ""; } if(customer.address){ if(customer.address.line1){ line1 = customer.address.line1; }else{ line1 =""; } if(customer.address.line2){ line2 = customer.address.line2 ; }else{ line2 =""; } if(customer.address.country){ country = customer.address.country; }else{ country = ""; } if(customer.address.postal_code){ postalcode= customer.address.postal_code; }else{ postal_code = ""; } if(customer.address.state){ state = customer.address.state ; }else{ state = ""; } if(customer.address.city){ city = customer.address.city; }else{ city = "" } if(customer.tax_ids.data.length > 0){ name: get customer account

Update billing details form
func:
node.warn("finishing creating form");
node.warn(msg)
msg.payload = msg.payload;


msg.url = "https://"+env.get('BASE_URL')+"/_matrix/client/r0/rooms/"+msg.roomId+"/send/m.room.message?access_token="+env.get("TEKOS_BOT_TOKEN");
var customer = msg.customer;
var line1, line2, country, postalcode, state, city, taxid, phone, company, name;

if(customer.metadata){
    phone = customer.metadata.phone;
    company = customer.metadata.company;
    name = customer.metadata.name;
}else{
    phone = "";
    company = "";
    name = "";
}

if(customer.address){
 line1 = customer.address.line1;
 line2 = customer.address.line2 ;
 country = customer.address.country ;
 postalcode= customer.address.postal_code; 
 state = customer.address.state;
 city =  customer.address.city;
 if(customer.tax_ids.data.length  > 0){
      taxid = customer.tax_ids.data[0].value ;

 }else{
     taxid = "";
 }

}else{
 line1 = "";
 line2 = "";
 country = "";
 postalcode= "";
 state = "";
 city =  "";
 taxid = ""; 
}

msg.payload={
    "body": "",
    "msgtype": "m.text",
    'titleform':'Update billing details',
    "posturl": "https://"+env.get("API_ACCESS_USER")+":"+env.get("API_ACCESS_PASS")+"@"+env.get("API_URL")+"/billing/update/"+msg.roomId+"/"+customer.id,
    "buttontitle": "Update",
    "tekosform": [

        "type": "input",
        "subtype": "text",
        "label": "Address",
        "key": "address",
        "defaultValue":line1
      },

      },

        "label": "Country",

Transactional Emails
html
template:
Bonjour {{request.name}}


Merci d'avoir choisi SPOPIN pour votre voiture au mois sans engagement et sans apport.

Afin de valider votre réservation, vous devez télécharger sur notre plateforme les documents suivants:

- Votre permis de conduire (valide, et obtenu depuis plus de 2 ans)

- Votre Carte d'Identité ou Passeport

- Votre RIB qui nous servira à établir la demande de prélèvement automatique que nous vous adresserons

Pour ce faire, rien de plus simple : cliquez sur le lien suivant https://spopin.tekos.co, créer votre compte personnel Spopin, et laissez vous guider par notre bot! Vous pourrez également choisir vos options kilométriques.

Si vous avez la moindre question, n'hésitez pas à nous l'adresser en répondant simplement à ce mail. Nous vous répondrons dans les 24h. Bien à vous Le service commercial Spopin

 

Votre véhicule

Type : {{car.car_type}}

Véhicule: {{car.name}}

{{car.petrol}}

{{car.gear}}

{{car.equipments}}

Votre forfait Liberté

{{car.price}} € TTC/mois

Forfait : {{request.offer}}

Forfait mensuel sans engagement - 1000km/mois inclus - Assurance tout risque - Entretien - Maintenance – Assistance

Modalités de restitution: Forfait résiliable à tout moment sous réserve d’un préavis de 2 semaines et du respect des Conditions Générales de Location de Spopin SAS.

Options possibles :

• 2000km/mois (moyenné sur la durée du contrat) ---------------------------> +100€ TTC/mois

• 3000km/mois (moyenné sur la durée du contrat) ---------------------------> +200€ TTC/mois

Prix du kilomètre supplémentaire : 0,20 € TTC

Mode de règlement : Paiement à échoir en début de mois – Première échéance à régler à la commande.

Frais de dossier: 150€ à la commande.

Un dépôt de garantie de 1000€ sera demandé correspondant au montant de la franchise en cas de dommages.

Condition de location: Être titulaire d’un permis de conduire valide dans le pays dans lequel le Véhicule est loué, et obtenu depuis plus de deux ans.

Ce devis est valable pendant 6 jours, sous réserve d’éligibilité de la zone de livraison et de disponibilité du véhicule

Si vous souhaitez avoir plus de renseignements concernant cette offre, ou pour obtenir une offre sur d'autres véhicules ou d'autres formules, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter par mail à contact@spopin.com



SPOPIN SAS - 45 rue Manin 75019 PARIS - France

SAS AU CAPITAL DE 10 000€ - RCS PARIS 834 717 118 00022 - TVA FR45834717118

contact: bonjour@spopin.com ou 06.24.50.13.55 – Toutes nos offres sur www.spopin.com
